title: Riot IP Banned All 40 of my Accounts
body:
First off, yes the chat logs are toxic. The thing I hate the most about League is the fact that people can talk shit to you, but when you reply, you just get hammered down. This SJW meta type dogshit that consists in this game is completely stupid. 

The fact I get a 10 game chat restriction for calling out and inter on one of my other fresh accounts, https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=mousebrother look at the Fiddle ADC and sivir support. Sivir force took Fiddles role as adc because Fiddle's Draven was banned, Fiddle says hes still going adc but as fiddle. Sivir starts stealing Fid's cs rather than supporting, thus Fiddle ints. I jump in to tell Sivir how she should stop csing and just support so fid can adc and we will win, she continues being toxic along with fid and loses us the game. I myself got a chat restriction on the account for that one bloody game, because this is what is toxic in league for fucks sake. People who are inting, people who mindlessly think for themselves, this is whats toxic. People saying insults is toxic sure, but you can literally mute them. You cant mute someone who is inting or contributing to the kid inting. 

Anyways, the game that happened we got a Kayn. The Kayn was someone who I played with/against many times on multiple accounts and he knows my Twitch. Every time I played with/against, he always flames everyone. This game he decides to flame me for being an "inting ugly nerd losing his promos". So I decide to respond back to it, considering this is what he does every single games ive ever played with him. Surely enough, he submits this one bloody chat game to a Riot support member, who then IP bans me. 

Every single account I have, is gone. I cant even log into any of them for the "reasoning" except for this one. Which this one, all it shows is this one game. This one single game of toxicity, which costs all 40 of my accounts. No "Kys" mentioned, not one swear word, literally just made fun of the dudes looks and language so he gets a taste of his own medicine for what he does every game, and thats worth all 40 of my accounts to be banned? It's actually ridiculous, all this does is create a more toxic environment, because now all that happens is I go back to a fresh account with a more toxic mentality because Riot simply does not care. If you want to stop toxicity, start banning the real problems which is Inting/Trolling. Neither I, or the Kayn (who is toxic), should receive a perma ban for something that can be stopped by a simple mute button. All this does is make players more and more toxic when they get banned. 

Anyways, heres the chat logs. Sure one game of toxicity for good reason, guess that means all 40 accounts should be banned.


Game 1
In-Game
AORVAL: aight just let me solo her **(When he failed gank top)**
AORVAL: getting yas fed **(Reply to enemy Irelia)**
AORVAL: my lanes done
AORVAL: just gonna open it **(I say this all the time because my mental is weak but I never actually open/afk in my games ever)**
AORVAL: go next
AORVAL: ok %%%%%%%%%%% lmfao
AORVAL: go back to china s%%%%%%%%%%%nty eye kid
AORVAL: welp
AORVAL: thats what happens when you get a shit jungler that screws your lane
AORVAL: no wonder you only have 1 viewer on twitch lol
AORVAL: bad at league and a crybaby
AORVAL: report?
AORVAL: ggez
AORVAL: winnable btw xD
Post-Game
AORVAL: yeah
AORVAL: kayn has a twitch btw
AORVAL: 1 viewer
AORVAL: poggers
AORVAL: ugly asian as well
AORVAL: %%%%%%%%%%% bing bing bing
AORVAL: eggwol
A%%%%%%%%%%%ou has eggwol
AORVAL: bing bing bing

https://imgur.com/YyIn4lE

replies.body: You must be pretty special to deserve an IP ban, as far as I know Riot doesn’t hand those out...ever.

> [{quoted}](name=insomniacjezz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-21T03:07:42.474+0000)
>
> You must be pretty special to deserve an IP ban, as far as I know Riot doesn’t hand those out...ever.

Guess being racist deserves an IP ban then idk. But I deadass cant login to any of my accounts since i got this permaban  a few hours ago

But all of them are perma'd so, of course, you can't log in to them. I guarantee Riot didn't IP ban you(as much as I wish they would). Why even keep playing after 40 banned accounts? And yet not learn your lesson?

> [{quoted}](name=Quáx,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-21T03:14:03.652+0000)
>
> But all of them are perma'd so, of course, you can't log in to them. I guarantee Riot didn't IP ban you(as much as I wish they would). Why even keep playing after 40 banned accounts? And yet not learn your lesson?

I could login to them before, but cant now. They were clearly IP banned or Riot just banned all the accounts that were tied with my email together.

Riot doesn't IP ban because resetting your router changes your IP.

Most likely thy just banned all accounts sharing your biometrics and habits.
Lol resetting router doesnt change anything, get your facts straight. 2nd Ritos biometrics are god awful since that is nearly impossiple to tie APM to a user.

>Lol resetting router doesnt change anything,

Ironically you're making the same mistake Terozu did: Overgeneralizing.
For a lot of people it does. A lot of people, as a matter of fact, do not even have to reset the router manually, as they are briefly disconnected every 24 hours.
I guess people who are used to dynamic IPs tend to forget static IPs exist, and vice versa.

Routers can be issued a new IP when they're reset.  This changes your IP which is why IP bans aren't used.

And your 'biometrics' contains way more than just APM, they store how you buy shop items, where you ward, how you aim skill shots, who you target, what you build and a shit ton of other stuff.

Get your facts straight.

> [{quoted}](name=AORVAL,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-04-21T03:09:24.217+0000)
>
> Guess being racist deserves an IP ban

Insert: Uh-Yeah-I-Sure-Hope-It-Does.jpeg

You'd think after 40 banned accounts you'd learn to be a decent human being. Ban deserved, have fun not playing league, you're clearly not welcome. This isn't an SJW issue, being not-racist has nothing to do with SJW culture, whatever that is.

Don't blame YOUR behavior on the world around you or other players. Takes 0 effort to keep racism out of chat; I would've reported you too if you were on my team.

Also, I noticed you said, "Neither you or the Kayn should receive a Perma for something that can be resolved with a mute button." Well, CLEARLY this doesn't work for you because if you'd utilized the mute button you might still have your account. Plus, in what word does being called an "inting nerd" cause you to go into so much rage that you immediately turn racist and you somehow think those insults are comparable? Lmao??

>You'd think after 40 banned accounts you'd learn to be a decent human being. 

All 40 of those accounts were banned at the same time lmao, notice the IP ban in the title. 

>Ban deserved, have fun not playing league, you're clearly not welcome. This isn't an SJW issue, being not-racist has nothing to do with SJW culture, whatever that is.

Making a new account as we speak, so guess im welcomed again.

>Don't blame YOUR behavior on the world around you or other players. Takes 0 effort to keep racism out of chat; I would've reported you too if you were on my team.

Never said my behavior wasnt toxic. Never blamed anyone else. I questioned why 40 of my accounts were banned over one game and why players who actually make a toxic environment by instigating/trolling dont get punished ever. Learn to read bud.

>Also, I noticed you said, "Neither you or the Kayn should receive a Perma for something that can be resolved with a mute button." Well, CLEARLY this doesn't work for you because if you'd utilized the mute button you might still have your account. Plus, in what word does being called an "inting nerd" cause you to go into so much rage that you immediately turn racist and you somehow think those insults are comparable? Lmao??

I dont mute in game because I find the toxicity funny in most cases. Him calling me an inting nerd isnt making me rage, I shit post and laugh it off my flaming him back.

My hero I hope you find joy in inting ranked games and making these snowflakes cry, banning my main for calling people stupid/idiotic/dumb etc is good enough to piss me off but inting 20-40 ranked games is alrighty :)))))))))))))))
Riot doesn't ban IP addresses because they're not a static or unique identifier.

>This SJW meta type dogshit that consists in this game is completely stupid.

 You lost all right to complain about Riot being overly strict or catering to "SJWs" when you said:

_AORVAL: go back to china s%%%%%%%%%%%nty eye kid
AORVAL: ugly asian as well
AORVAL: %%%%%%%%%%% bing bing bing_

 Racism has no place in League and every single one of your punishments was warranted. 

 On to the title of the post:

 Riot doesn't usually IP-ban players since they can be easily bypassed through VPNs and IP addresses aren't static, they're constantly changing. 

 You can file a support ticket to get more information about your suspensions. 


____________
 If I can be super unprofessional and blunt, you should stop playing entirely, at the very least until you change your attitude. The fact that you're trying to justify your racism as Riot being a part of "this SJW meta type dogshit" is really sad, dude. 

Nobody wants a racist teammate and Riot doesn't want racists playing their game. If you want to keep this childish act up, be my guest. You're only wasting your own time.

>You lost all right to complain about Riot being overly strict or catering to "SJWs" when you said:

I never said what I said isnt toxic. If you bothered reading the post or comprehending it for that matter, youd see that Im complaining about how 

#1. One account gets every account banned. 
#2. People who int/troll dont get punished as hard as a person saying a naughty word, which creates an even more toxic environment.
#3. The "SJW" part was to fill out that Riot bans you because someone gets triggered from your saying when theres a mute button implemented to stop those from seeing the offensive chat. That was literally one line and thats all you took from the post is that I called Riot SJW lol.

>If I can be super unprofessional and blunt, you should stop playing entirely, at the very least until you change your attitude. The fact that you're trying to justify your racism as Riot being a part of "this SJW meta type dogshit" is really sad, dude.

Again the only thing you takeaway from this is that I called Riot a SJW, nice one. And nah dont worry, I got a new account and this time im not even gonna care about toxicity. Riot bans all my accounts for one game? Then I guess ill just show them what toxic really is like in high elo when I get there.

>1. One account gets every account banned.

 Not true, I and many others have been permanently banned and still have alternative accounts. The reason why I said you should file a support ticket is because IP and ID bans don't get applied to regular players, usually only content creators who can be easily identified. 

>2. People who int/troll dont get punished as hard as a person saying a naughty word, which creates an even more toxic environment.

 I'd like to see this be more consistent, but AFKing, trolling, and inting are all instantly punishable with a 14-day ban or more.

>3. The "SJW" part was to fill out that Riot bans you because someone gets triggered from your saying when theres a mute button implemented to stop those from seeing the offensive chat. That was literally one line and thats all you took from the post is that I called Riot SJW lol.

 You literally opened your post by saying "This SJW meta type dogshit that consists in this game is completely stupid." which would imply what follows pertains to that statement. You should word your post better.

 That's clearly not all I took from the post considering I offered you advice in the form of what to do, and then I explained why IP/ID bans (most likely) wouldn't be applied to a regular player such as yourself.  The reason I didn't specifically mention anything relating to the Kayn/Sivir situations is because your racism was so egregious that it didn't matter. 

 If you want me to address that, I'll give you the same spiel that anyone else would give you. Someone else's rulebreaking doesn't justify your own, just because they broke the rules doesn't mean you get to stoop to their level and skirt by without punishment. A mute button might be a solution in _other_ games, but Riot has made it clear that they don't want any sort of negativity on their platform. 

Don't like it? Don't play. That's generally how rules work for optional activities. 

>Riot bans all my accounts for one game? Then I guess ill just show them what toxic really is like in high elo when I get there.

  You realize you're not making a grand statement or anything, right? You're complaining about the state of the game/community and then **directly contributing to the very minority that upset you in the first place.** It's backwards and you're just being a hypocrite.

 Like I said though, you're only wasting _your_ time and your time alone. Hope you can let this grudge go and just move on.

> 
>  I'd like to see this be more consistent, but AFKing, trolling, and inting are all instantly punishable with a 14-day ban or more.
> 

AFKing is most certainly NOT punished with an instant 14-days or worse, you need to afk many games in a not-very-big amount of time to get 14-days for afking. Also, imo, there should either be automated systems for all offences or for none. Just an opinion


And I am clearly not defending the OP, just in case someone says that. I don't like racism, find it despicable and do think it should warrant an IP ban. (although I doubt his IP got banned considering riot don't do that, even Tyler was only banned on the accounts he owned after the fact when those accounts became public knowledge that he was the one playing them)

> AFKing is most certainly NOT punished with an instant 14-days or worse, you need to afk many games in a not-very-big amount of time to get 14-days for afking.

 I should have separated that one from the rest, mb. 

 Either way, point was that OP thinks AFKers aren't punished, but they are. :p

> [{quoted}](name=AORVAL,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2019-04-21T06:51:41.626+0000)
>
> I never said what I said isnt toxic. If you bothered reading the post or comprehending it for that matter, youd see that Im complaining about how 
> 
> #2. People who int/troll dont get punished as hard as a person saying a naughty word, which creates an even more toxic environment.
> #3. The "SJW" part was to fill out that Riot bans you because someone gets triggered from your saying when theres a mute button implemented to stop those from seeing the offensive chat. That was literally one line and thats all you took from the post is that I called Riot SJW lol.

Riot bans all my accounts for one game? Then I guess ill just show them what toxic really is like in high elo when I get there.

what is it these people don't seem to get? Just because there is a mute function, it should not be the expectation that people should ever want or have to use it. The expectation is that it is a team game and I want to work and collaborate with my team. Not have an open channel for flaming that I may choose to close at any time.

> [{quoted}](name=A Real Troll,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2019-04-21T06:56:46.119+0000)
>
> what is it these people don't seem to get? Just because there is a mute function, it should not be the expectation that people should ever want or have to use it. The expectation is that it is a team game and I want to work and collaborate with my team. Not have an open channel for flaming that I may choose to close at any time.

Literally every high elo player will tell you the same thing, Im saying masters-challenger players. Chat is the most useless thing in this game, and holds you back if you dont hide it. The only time people ever use chat is to question why you didnt make a play by doing something, or just blatantly flaming you. And the time you spend typing or reading chat, could be used to look at map. So if anything having chat for a team work collaboration never works, and Ive had many challenger elo players tell me pretty much the same thing in different summaries.

> [{quoted}](name=AORVAL,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=0003000100000000,timestamp=2019-04-21T07:03:06.585+0000)
>
> Literally every high elo player will tell you the same thing, Im saying masters-challenger players. Chat is the most useless thing in this game, and holds you back if you dont hide it. The only time people ever use chat is to question why you didnt make a play by doing something, or just blatantly flaming you. And the time you spend typing or reading chat, could be used to look at map. So if anything having chat for a team work collaboration never works, and Ive had many challenger elo players tell me pretty much the same thing in different summaries.

That is because the culture of league breeds toxicity. Riot is trying to change that. I use chat to help my team all the time.

> [{quoted}](name=Hotarµ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-04-21T04:26:14.816+0000)

>  If I can be super unprofessional and blunt, you should stop playing entirely, at the very least until you change your attitude. The fact that you're trying to justify your racism as Riot being a part of "this SJW meta type dogshit" is really sad, dude. 
> 
> Nobody wants a racist teammate and Riot doesn't want racists playing their game. If you want to keep this childish act up, be my guest. You're only wasting your own time.

As much as I agree, the racism got him banned and he can cop that shit. Plenty of people are banned for nothing racist or personal threats or anything.
And i've personally reported plenty of people who are racist towards Australians/assumed white people in my games andf they have never been punished. So there is SOME merit to his calling out the SJW mindset of their system, as it clearly does fall in line with the current SJW climate of "you can't be racist towards white people" or similar.

"SJW meta type dogshit" im not exactly sure how anyone could even make comments about this and not be in any way offensive? and im not even sure how Fritolay Games could do that

i guess like just misgendering people calling your team guys since obv girls dont play league? then when they correct you you just acknowledge it and call them guys anyway then after you get banned for offensive language?

that even sounded dumb while i was typing it
Can you just take the hint?  40 bans means Riot doesn't want you playing this game
That's not what he's claiming. He's not saying he got banned 40 times, he's saying he had 40 accounts and all were banned for this one game.

> [{quoted}](name=Shandrake,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-04-21T03:58:28.238+0000)
>
> Can you just take the hint?  40 bans means Riot doesn't want you playing this game

Welp sucks to suck because I can make a new account #41 coming soon.

> [{quoted}](name=AORVAL,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2019-04-21T06:52:27.938+0000)
>
> Welp sucks to suck because I can make a new account #41 coming soon.

Can you name it "AngusBoardsPants" in honor of me?
It's bold to come onto this board, posting your super racist chat log, and then trying to get anyone to sympathize.
Your mentality is the problem, actually. Good luck.

I just wanna know what kind of psychopath has 40 accounts???? Do you have a spreadsheet with all the usernames and password or do you have some pattern for usernames (ex bob1, bob2, bob3) and then the same password for all? Also please explain to me why you had  40 accounts to begin with?

>I just wanna know what kind of psychopath has 40 accounts???? Do you have a spreadsheet with all the usernames and password or do you have some pattern for usernames (ex bob1, bob2, bob3) and then the same password for all?

Me, and yes I keep a note on my phone with all the usernames of the accounts, and they all have the same password except for one which is my main.

>Also please explain to me why you had 40 accounts to begin with?

Many different reasons. I would do Unranked - Diamond streams on Twitch which gave me most of my followers, because low elo players want to learn how to get better at the game. I also had multiple accounts to try different champions out and roles. I had a specific account for Jayce top, crit Jayce top, Crit jayce adc, Jayce adc, Jayce mid, and Jayce support. I also had a few accounts for trying out different champions/roles, and when youre doing level 1 - 30 youre able to buy more champions, so I did that quite a bit to try new champions and see if I can add them to my champion pool.
tbh  ,,, cant you have  like only 2 acc,s ,,, one  beeing your main and the second  for testing new champions ,(or its more easy to farm new champ  on  new acc ? )

Could you provide some of the reform cards from when you log into accounts other than that account (include the entire client in the screenshot), or whatever comes up when you attempt to log in to them? Riot has explicitly stated that they do not IP ban, so if your claim is that they are in fact IP banning it'd be nice to have more to go on that just your word. To my knowledge, they will also not ban one account for the actions of another account.

> [{quoted}](name=Vreivai,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-04-21T05:14:40.469+0000)

To my knowledge, they will also not ban one account for the actions of another account.

https://imgur.com/JJtJGk8

This is what shows up every time. it doesnt even let me login to any of them as I said. Every single one has this "Your username/pass is wrong", even though the user/pass is all correct. It doesn't let me login, doesnt provide any information for the ban, its simply banned. Unless they banned it based off the accounts signed up with my email, then idk.

> [{quoted}](name=AORVAL,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-04-21T06:44:53.391+0000)

Have you tried that "forgotten password" feature that's linked in your screenshot?

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2019-04-21T06:50:57.234+0000)
>
> Have you tried that "forgotten password" feature that's linked in your screenshot?

Yeah nothing goes to my email tho its weird. I even tried the forgotten username and only 5 of the 40 accounts assigned to that email show up.

Did the accounts possibly get compromised? If you're banned, it will tell you you're banned. Your computer may have been compromised and someone was able to gain access to them that way, though it would be odd for what I'm guessing are less frequently used ones to be compromised while the one you were banned on is fine. I assume you've carefully checked your input of both the username and the password for them? Made sure you're definitely hitting all the right keys and all the keystrokes are actually registering?

That's because it's the wrong password or username.

That account hasn't necessarily been banned, you just can't login to it lol.

> [{quoted}](name=AORVAL,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-04-21T06:44:53.391+0000)

Wait this is actually what happened to me. I thought I was the only one and at first thought I was hacked or something.

This is fucked man, Riot can't even give us a proper ban, they have to make us think we are hacked.

What chatlog does it show for the other accounts?

How are you sure it was an IP ban (which Rito does not give as far as I know)?

they didn't IP Ban you. they banned all your accounts because everytime you would be toxic and get banned, you would just go onto the next account, effectively removing the punishment.

I'd advise taking a break from League of Legends and access your mental health. Clearly if you can be toxic across 40 accounts and still want to play the game there's something else going on with you outside of the game.

You are free to make a new account btw.

I wish you well.
How the fuck are you trying to justify yourself? You are literally the Racist 2016 Tyler1. Get off of League, we don't want you here.

> [{quoted}](name=DestroyerDome,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7hY7mjg5,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-04-21T05:45:10.592+0000)

then you don't understand what an ip ban implies >.>

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

would be a valid answer if he said it. assuming he did is not valid tho.
can u plz add me you sound hilarious
Lol true, but clearly the game commited suicide with the new logo made by a 40 year old male that had no touch with a younger audience.

This sounds more like an ID ban than an IP ban, because I thought Riot stopped IP banning people due to the issues it can cause
